name: Windiness
description:
Type a username, press RETURN/ENTER, and dodge the blocks as you try to get to the portal in record time!

ONLINE SCOREBOARD! Enter your username or something funny, and your top-4 score will be displayed to all players within 3 seconds, and stay until it has been knocked off the top-4!

PRESS [R] TO GENERATE A NEW LEVEL IF YOU GET STUCK

Tweet me (@GrifyDev) with any bugs or updates you want and I'll add them pronto!

The beautiful music for Windiness was kindly done by Joa Fuentes (Joaquín Fuentes)!
